message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more but you still get a lot
Let's split a bit more evenly this time. This offer is fair and gets us both a good amount.
I'll lower my initial offer a bit, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
Time is running out, and we both lose if we don't agree soon. This offer is a compromise, slightly favoring me but still giving you a significant share.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and your last offer, but I'm not going any lower than this
Alice, we're getting dangerously close to losing everything. This offer is very close to a 50/50 split. Let's be rational and take it before inflation eats away at our potential gains any further.
I'll drop my offer by 10k, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Inflation is hurting you, not me, so don't wait too long
Alice, this is it. A true 50/50 split. Take it before we both end up with nothing. This is our last chance to be fair.
